title: Fly.io
description: Run your full stack apps (and databases!) all over the world. No ops required.
descriptionOfFreePlan: Up to 3 shared-cpu-1 256mb VMs with 3GB total storage

comparisonInfo.supportedLanguage: Using Docker, any apps that can be run in a container
comparisonInfo.supportedDatabase: Using Docker, any DB that can be run in a container
